mapper.insert: insert into news_comment (comment_num,news_num,writer,content) values ((select nvl(max(comment_num)+1,1) from news_comment) , #{news_num}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT nc.writer, wdtt.name, nc.content, nc.join_date, comment_num, nc.news_num FROM news_comment nc LEFT OUTER JOIN wdtt ON nc.writer = wdtt.userid WHERE news_num = #{news_num} ORDER BY comment_num ASC
mapper.update: update news_comment set content=#{content} where comment_num = #{comment_num}
